website_summaries.verdict: An eco-friendly ant killer that works on most insect pests.
pros: Can spray on fabrics, flooring, and furniture to kill the full pest life cycle
Made with natural ingredients so it's safe for use in kitchens and around food prep materials
cons: Not the strongest product on the market
Spray doesn't seem to kill ants, just repel them

customer_reviews.title: Safe around cooking areas
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to find a product that can be used in your cupboards without worry. Just need a quick rinse of pots and pans if you used the Spray and not the Stream. The Lemongrass scent is wonderful and it lasts a long time making your kitchen smell clean and fresh. We live in an RV so our whole house smelled very nice all day. It did take a couple of applications to get rid of the "critters" but so much better than having to have the chemical smell from other products.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Warren

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product actually sucks. I bought it for my apartment because apparently I now have an ant problem. When I first got the spray it killed the ants on contact. I thought “alright, good so far”. Then I sprayed all the corners and the floor to kill or repell any remaining ants. The bottle says it kills, repels and prevents pests... it barely does the first thing. I have to spray 1 ant about 5 times for it to stop and die. It repels nothing, and the smell is overpowering and annoying. I thought I would like lemongrass but it’s just too much. 1 out of 5 stars. I still have ants.
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: Read. Notice. And Believe in my short wasted review.
customer_reviews.text: There will always be at least a few bugs that have avoided the spray so don't expect the product to work 100% all the time, however it was powerful enough to take down a majority of the fruit flies I've been dealing with (in the air and on tables). The scent is rather strong for my nose when the product is used too many times and the smell will NOT fade away on whatever surfaces the spray has been used on so get ready to clean, wipe, Clorox, and/or febreeze your home when buying this product. Overall, the quality is worthwhile and just to be fair it's value shows on the price
customer_reviews.author: April Thao

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have a recent ant problem. This sounded like a good product. There were several ants in my trashcan. I liberally sprayed this in and around the bin. The ants that were there seemed to get a little woozy, but didn't die. Even though I sprayed the area around the bin, the ants just kept coming and I sprayed again to no avail. The sprayer doesn't fit tight and leaks. I don't care for the scent, it carries through the house. This was an expensive fail. Wish I could say something positive, but I wasn't pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sandlier

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Yes like every house you get bugs with the different seasons and weather but never these little tiny ants taking over my kitchen. My sister told me about this product and it truly does miracles and works! One spray and gone. Love it so much I bought one for my daughter who is also amazed. It is pet friendly as well which makes a big difference. I ordered Lemongrass and to me it is strong. To my sister it is "refreshing". Absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: MommaJ

customer_reviews.title: Did not kill spiders
customer_reviews.text: I have spiders in every corners in my house so I bought this natural spray. I sprayed directly on the spiders. However, they did not show any sign of stress. I waited a week, and, most, if not all, spiders are still there, alive and fine. So I bought a different spider killer that they say kill on contact. I sprayed them tonight and they fell dead in 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Austinics101

customer_reviews.title: Wonder-Ful
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge ant problem for a couple of weeks they were all over my bathtub ,toilet bowl, sink, ceiling ,walls and floor . I tried those liquid traps which attracted more of them then I had an exterminator come ;that also just attracted more of them . Then I used phantom spray that I got from my exterminator and that worked for maybe a day before they returned but they were still not gone completely and the smell was overwhelming . I read the reviews on this product and gave it a try and they are gone completely !!. I’m talking about 30 to 50 ants a day for a few weeks to nothing with this product !
customer_reviews.author: Thespy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as preventive/permanent measure..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a cat and it says it's pet safe. I tried for a week. Didn't really get rid of the roaches. I spray counter tops and crevices, but the roaches came back each night. This will kill smaller roaches with 1 spray. Large one require will require multiple spray. The scent is not bad but quite strong. For the price I paid, I feel like it should've worked better. I am not even sure if the product's effective after it dries on the counters. It does leave the spray location with some oil-ish texture/stain.
customer_reviews.author: Kavi Tan

customer_reviews.title: Got the lemongrass scent and it's terrible. The scent is so strong that makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the lemongrass scent and it's terrible. The scent is so strong that makes it hard to breathe. And it's not a good lemon scent either. It smells like straight up cleaning chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brushett

customer_reviews.title: Waited OVER a month. NOTHING. Thumbs DOWN
customer_reviews.text: Waited over a month for my order to arrive. I finally made my OWN natural flea spray. Lemongrass essential oils & water. Was all. PROBLEM SOLVED. This product was $34. What I made cost me about $8 for the Lemongrass & u only need like 20 drops
customer_reviews.author: J Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Magic potion, but not convenient
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seems to work like magic, but it has a VERY potent smell that hangs around for hours. I got the lemon scented one. It's not terrible per se, but it's very strong. I sprayed my plants about 6 hours ago and it still smells like I just used it. But, I have to give it credit. I already see less fungus gnats! The only other bothersome issue is that the spray cap doesn't stay on well and it leaks a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Peperomiapink9

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and does nothing to kill off Flies. I used the entire bottle this summer for the flies, moths, and June bugs (I live on a ranch), with no real effect. Kept them away for a couple minutes but then they were right back. Outdoor stuff was even worse and did nothing to keep them away.
customer_reviews.author: Avid user

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: In NJ the invasion of the Japanese coach roach has begun. Never had it before but my neighbor's son's family came to live with them for the summer and brought their toys outdoors thus invading NJ. Thought the winters would kill them but no. This product keeps them from coming into the house during the summer and in the first 20 degree temp drop. Snow too. They will run to the opening of the doors when it snows. I now have to get this every year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but smell is overpowering to pets and myself
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to work; for fungal flies and it smells good just a little too much smell. Even for myself. It indicates is not harmful to children or pets but doesn't indicate pacifically it is harmful to "Cats." As there is a picture for dogs only.....I have trouble breathing after spraying my self because smell is overpowering even though it smells good just a little much. But it does work; it just takes a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Mom

customer_reviews.title: Effective, with an attractive scent
customer_reviews.text: We were frustrated with "sugar ants" in our apartment that were refractory to several generations of ant baits. We also have cats, so didn't want to use a product that would be dangerous to them. This Wondercide definitely took care of the ant problem (durably!). Love the lemon grass scent. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well great natural solution
customer_reviews.text: It can be challenging trying to keep your home organic. This product is amazing. In fact when I spray it on a bug the thing just dies right away it’s great. The smells not that strong and my puppy doesn’t seem to be bothered by the smell at all. We mostly use it for ants and mosquitos. I’ve purchased 2 already. I even use it on areas I know the ants love and it really does prevent them from coming back. I know it’s time to spray the crevice once I see an ant again. Usually 1nce a week sometimes even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: does not work whatsoever and the company will hassle you to leave a product review after purchasing
customer_reviews.author: aaron hovey

customer_reviews.title: Works on stink bugs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant scent and very effective on stink bugs and even spotted lantern flies, with direct hit (they both move slow so it’s kind of like target practice.). Indoors, it does leave a soapy residue, most visible on glass. FYI, it’s doesn’t cause most bug to drop and die in a second. Especially tough bugs like stink bugs will wander around but eventually dehydrate.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Not working for us
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this after using the outdoor product for several years. I really, really wanted to see the water bug roaches in our kitchen disappear. I keep our kitchen really clean, no crumbs, no damp places and have sprayed under all the cabinets and appliances. I gave this 5 months. It does kill bugs if you spray them....5 seconds. Not the result I hoped for. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeaux

customer_reviews.title: Nice spray
customer_reviews.text: I got this spray b/c my room is in our basement and I have been noticing some daddy- longlegs on my ceiling. I have been using it every few days for about a week now and I am not certain how good its going. I want to say its working but its hard to say. I have the lemongrass scent and it is way more potent than I was expecting but I like the smell so it doesnt bother me that much. The scent can last days tho
customer_reviews.author: Travelbug23

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it had a more pleasant smell than most chemical products but it is a strong smell. Reminds me of pine-sol. I used nearly an entire bottle for my basement and stairs. The square feet is about 12,000. I did spray a bit heavier in the unfinished part and places I had seen spiders before. Since I use so much of the bottle each time, I’m hoping I don’t have to spray as often since this is a little more costly. I would suggest to put a fan in any areas you spray to help with the smell. Otherwise it takes a few days for it to fade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really work for house/filth flies
customer_reviews.text: For some reason there’s a lot of flies around my neighborhood.. They come into the house and buzzzzz trying to get out through the glass window.. it s so annoying. So I bought this sprayed generously on the window sills and around the doors, inside and outside, by the garbage cans... So it did help somewhat by the garbage but not by the windows.. I see them around the windows and they’re very much alive and it’s not bothering them. I even reapplied every day, didn’t help
customer_reviews.author: mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: I found a flea in my laundry basket and sprayed ...
customer_reviews.text: I found a flea in my laundry basket and sprayed it, not even a minute later I swiped my finger across it and it disintegrated, (I’m fairly certain it was alive before I sprayed)
customer_reviews.author: 11th Hour Mobile Notary

customer_reviews.title: WORST CRAP EVER ABSOLUTE GARBAGE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: THE AMAZON PRODUCT PAGE FOR THIS PRODUCT SAID IT WAS OKAY TO USE ON PLANTS. WHEN IT ARRIVED, I USED IT ON A DOZEN DIFFERENT KITCHEN PLANTS. WITHIN TWO DAYS THEY ARE ALL DYING. THESE ARE YEARS WORTH OF PLANTS THAT I GREW AND TOOK CARE OF MYSELF. THIS PRODUCT DID THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS WORTH OF DAMAGE TO MY PLANTS AND GUESS WHAT.... THE FLIES ARE STILL THERE. THATS RIGHT IT DIDNT EVEN KILL THE FLIES THAT ITS SUPPOSED TO KILL. THIS PRODUCT IS ABSOLUTE GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Max Volume

customer_reviews.title: It definitely does what it says !!
customer_reviews.text: With start of winter, we had ant problem near kitchen and patio area. I was little worried to use any pest control in kitchen or indoor with little kids around. However, I tried this carefully and it worked great keeping ants under control. Additionally helped to keep spiders under control for few weeks. The smell/scent of the spray is strong stays for a couple of days that's the only problem I had otherwise I will use it again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: S. CHHAJED

customer_reviews.title: It does work! but not so effective ! It kills plants 🌱
customer_reviews.text: Not so effective against fruit flies! As warned, it’s very damaging for plants , it kills plants! Don’t spray on the soil of any infested pot plants!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone all natural in my flea treatment this year and couldn’t do it without Wondercide. I vacuum everyday and spray it on the rugs. I also use Wondercide’s spray on my “kids.” Kills the fleas and makes the house smell like lemongrass. So glad there is a natural product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the ants away momentarily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get rid of ants in my kitchen. I have to keep spraying, soaking the ants in order to kill them, and it seems they come back as soon as the product dries and the scent fades. I've been using it for a week and not very pleased since it was so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good killer, for both insects and plants.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help stop a gnat problem with my indoor plant. Scent I got was lemongrass, smelled lovely. Almost immediately stopped the gnat problem, so it does do its job if your just spraying for insects. My only reason for giving 4/5 stars is because it also killed my indoor plant. Nowhere in the description on Amazon does it say not safe for plants, in fact I even read a couple of answered questioned stating that it was safe.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S.

customer_reviews.title: Product not as affective and Cost too much!
customer_reviews.text: Product cost way too much to have to use so often around your home in order to see proper results. Product scent is good yet does not kill instant nor on contact like product states. Product yet is safe around children and pets which is an awesome thing! If product could be more effect for the money you spend that will be great to!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Love

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Please warn all shoppers to be extremely careful when using this spray near tile floors. It is extremely slippery. I slipped once and fell the 2nd time. I'm in my 70s, have had 2 hip replacements, and do need another. Just a warning.
customer_reviews.author: SamsPookie

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. I had little black ants in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I had little black ants in my kitchen area for awhile. I tried everything and nothing really got rid of them until I bought this product. I have animals in the house and I also needed something safe to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and strong smell
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new puppy and brought it home not knowing it had fleas. We only had it in the house for a short time since it is an outside puppy but that 30 minutes was all it took to have fleas in the house. I sprayed this very heavily in on our carpets and the smell was super strong and it did not work. Would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This is what I've been searching for.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's safe for humans and ("normal") pets. I don't know how I did without it. With regular insecticides, I always felt it was a trade-off to use them. I'd get rid of single instances of the pests, but by poisoning the surroundings. I bought Wondercide initially to control roaches, but soon discovered pantry moths and, today, ants. I'm glad I have Wondercide available to help eliminate all these pests. I have no problem with the Lemongrass scent. Much better than the unnatural smell of ordinary bug sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent, little help
customer_reviews.text: I got the lemongrass scent and jeez the scent is overwhelmingly strong!! Especially bc it barely does the job. My current apartment has terrible sealing around windows and the front door, so I always have critters intruding. I used this indoors bc I have pets, and the raid on the outside. But the combination still isn’t enough to keep the critters from coming in
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: The scent wasn't the best. I was glad that I was able to close the door and not have the smell go into the rest of the house. I applied as directed but it wasn't as effective as we hoped. I had to purchase different spray. I gave this spray a couple of weeks to work.
customer_reviews.author: Spinox

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural alternative to get rid of ants 🐜
customer_reviews.text: We have an issue with ants 🐜 & it’s driving me crazy!!! They love our new kitchen & I’ve literally tried everything. Tried the chemical ant traps on counters nothing... tried several home remedy options & worked a little. Tried several Natural brands I bought on Amazon & I actually think the ants liked it! Wondercide was my last hope & it honestly seems to be working! I have small dogs - so I worry about chemicals and mainly only use chem-free so I’m really happy this is working. Smell is a little strong at first & you have to treat repeatedly as it isn’t an instant cure! But I’m hopeful
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Graff

customer_reviews.title: Scents
customer_reviews.text: The Lemongrass scent okay, but the Peppermint would be my choice for future. I have that scent for my cat after returning the Cedar which was way too powerful . Anyone who lives in a small apt may have the same problem I am having with the scent completely taking over and may be hard to sleep, and eat for awhile because of the smell on my hands. Works pretty good , but I feel I am not putting enough on because of the smell. Better than poisons though, so Thank You for this product !
customer_reviews.author: LesLee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Is not effective, complete rip off
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn’t really work as advertised. I’ve sprayed this on flies as they’re sitting on a window on the outside of my house and they just fly away and come back. One died as I was lucky enough to basically empty half of the bottle on it, but unless you use a LARGE amount repeadetly on one fly it is completely ineffective and useless. Considering the price it’s a huge rip off but I wouldn’t pay $1 for this again if given the option. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kill the ants save your pet from harmful chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best. Kill the ants, save your pets from harmful chemicals. First saw it on the Shark Tank. Nothing else works as well. Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: I wasn’t through writing the review. How do I finish it!

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but really not effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought it hoping to prevent and repel. All the reviews seemed to do the job. But ive currently got the affected area coated and the ants couldnt care less. The number hasnt decreased and you can still see the residue but ants everywhere. Pretty disappointed for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kuro

customer_reviews.title: Works well, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best natural product out there. It works! The smell is strong but of completely natural scents which is such a relief after using awful chemicals. We live in an area with a massive ant presence and this handled it wonderfully. And safe for our kids and dog to be around!
customer_reviews.author: Mjo0505

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Effective without any bad odor....I bought the lemongrass scent...it is a pleasant fragrance ....ants had started showing in my bathroom....this spray killed the present ones and prevented any more infestations..buy it
customer_reviews.author: Joan Daly

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works on contact. If you spray a fly, it immediately dies. If you spray a stink bug, it does kill it, but slowly. It works great when you first treat an area (doorway, window...), but it doesn't seem to last very long. The smell is very strong, but not a gross chemical smell so it's not too bad. I would recommend this product to keep around the house to spray bugs that you see, I would not recommend for long term treatment to keep bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use with kids
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is safe to use. I have a 15 month old and it is important to me to have safe products. I bought the lemongrass scented spray abd it smells clean. I noticed a difference in bugs coming in the house after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Leanora Shay

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job. The smell is super strong of lemon but that's not necessarily a bad thing. Smells way better than typical bug sprays that are way more toxic.
customer_reviews.author: heather mallon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive
customer_reviews.text: I love that is not poisonous and I can use it in the kitchen and around my child. Unfortunately, once it dries ants do not mind crawling ALL over it.
customer_reviews.author: Enma Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Smells very strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very strong and unpleasant. Smell lingered for several hours. Pretty sure it did nothing to stop any bugs but it did cause the smaller bugs to get stuck on the window screen. Shipping was fast and on time.
customer_reviews.author: eljax

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my ants when ant baits didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have a few small ants in various rooms in my house that seem to wander in and out. Spraying this on the ants kills them directly, but spraying them on the base boards seems to keep them out for a while. I spray this on my baseboards every few weeks or so and it keeps the ants out! Also smells really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wondercide
customer_reviews.text: I am very well pleased with the product. I purchased it before a few months ago and had wonderful success with the results. I, most definitely would recommend it to others for relief from indoor pests.
customer_reviews.author: DanLand

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I only sprayed this in 2 spots in my home, the bathroom and basement cellar and I could barely breath on my first floor. It said it was safe for kids but do not buy this, if I can’t barely breath how can my kid!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Hose

customer_reviews.title: Great natural pest control.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a natural pest control.It does the job. We have ants every spring. And this got rid of them pretty quickly. The scent is strong but the smell does down.
customer_reviews.author: Jerika Marthaler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $35
customer_reviews.text: I tested it out by spraying a spider on contact in my house and it just kept going, I kept spraying. I had to take it a step further to actually kill it. In my opinion for $35 spray I want the spider stopping in its tracks the moment I spray it.
customer_reviews.author: Sar D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent and easy to use! Wasn’t as affective as I thought it would be though. I used half a bottle over the course of a month following their instructions but still had bugs coming in the House. They seemed to not be deterred by the spray and overall not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Natural spray for pest control
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product once, but I must say I've already seen less bugs. My main problem was gnats and small crawling bugs. Just spraying the baseboards and windowsills has made a big difference. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Blair

customer_reviews.title: This product has been great. Killed the gnats we had
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I have a lung disease, and can’t breathe in harsh chemicals. We also have small dogs, so I needed something pet safe. This product has been great. Killed the gnats we had, without running me out of the house. I highly recommend you try this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have several cats and I use this natural product in their bedding area. It seems to work well!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try Wondercide and I am so glad I did this product WOKED and worked fast
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. I had tried many products but needed something to get rid of ants that had taking over the kitchen. I did not want to use something dangerous for kids or dogs so I bought several different traps. These barely worked.... I decided to try Wondercide and I am so glad I did this product WOKED and worked fast. No more ants. I can use it in the kennels and anywhere in the house with no worries and it smells great - like an air freshener. Best money ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Melody K4

customer_reviews.title: Don't put under the sun
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well until I left it on my desk, where it got sunlight in the afternoons... not really strong sunshine, but I guess that disabled this product
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Magic Bug Killer
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on how effective this would be, especially on southern bugs like - ugh - roaches. But let me tell you, a few sprays and bugs are DEAD! Love the scent and so glad I found a product that actually works and I can use around my pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Handley

customer_reviews.title: Just by Raid and save your money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing different from the Raid can I bought for $3.00.
customer_reviews.author: Luis N. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but spray was impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like the oroduct..but the bottle spray you had to put together?!.I never got it to work so I had to put in another container
customer_reviews.author: Ali Gator

customer_reviews.title: Horribly Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is horribly strong. Very overwhelming. I bought two bottles and I’m returning the unused one.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but works... give it a few zaps!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is my second time buying this item, the 1st it didn't seem like it worked but I got the hang of it, you just got to spray it a few times directly on the bug and give it a few seconds it will work. I Just wish more came in it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ants kept coming back
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed trouble areas several times but ants kept coming back. I finally had to have a pest control service take care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff & safe to use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Never ordered the patio one but it's basically same. I use indoors, on dog & patio. No more fleas or mosquitos, that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny  Florida

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, works soso
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Could work better! Leaves a nasty film on everything. You have to directly spray flies to kill them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Choman

customer_reviews.title: Good for small ants, not for the big ones
customer_reviews.text: I had the tiny ants around a window. Sprayed this once and they were gone the next day. Tried to use on larger carpenter ants, but it did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Neejust what I needed. Totally safe for petsded something safe for pets and this did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Enochs

customer_reviews.title: No more Carpet beetles
customer_reviews.text: We had carpet beetles in our bathroom. It really worked! Also the smell was nice.
customer_reviews.author: AthletsMom

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Flies and other insects are more agitated and invasive since spraying.
customer_reviews.author: Ray McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: All natural and works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product a number of times because I have a cat that's allergic to life - with Wondercide I know I can keep her flea free without being concerned about an allergic reaction - GREAT STUFF!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Faber

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to combat sugar ants inside and right by outside window and door entrances. Been using it for two months and it works great! And the good news is, you can spray heavily and the scent is mild, pleasant, and does not linger more than 15 mins or so.
customer_reviews.author: kerroppi666

customer_reviews.title: It does NOT work on mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for mosquitoes. I had to look at the bottle again to see if mosquito is on the flies that this product claims it works on. I am super confused as to why I still mosquitoes flying past me and making fun of me with their annoying noises...well they know it does not work on them. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Gigified

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: We had a terrible ant invasion problem this very wet spring. I tried homemade remedies and finally traditional products to get rid of it, with limited and short-lived success. I saw this product, and although it was expensive, decided to give it a try. It seems to have worked! I applied in several locations two weeks ago, and so far, no ants!! The smell was a little strong, but dissipated fairly quickly. I am very pleased and would certainly recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer problem
customer_reviews.text: The product had a good smell and no toxic chemicals; it worked in an area where insects were getting into a closet. the only problem is that the sprayer would not fit properly onto the bottle and when spraying it leaked all around the the top. I transferred the product to an old windex bottle. Maybe I just happened to get a faulty one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Used this indoors, as directed for over a week and saw no difference whatsoever -had to use chemicals-now they are gone as far as I can tell. Two stars bc it does kill roaches on contact spraying
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: the smell is awful and you better air out your house for an entire day
customer_reviews.text: easy to use but i literally could not breathe after using this the smell is awful
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: I like that its ingredients list are items that I am not afraid of having around my animals and that its smell doesn't drive me from the room. It is very effective even though its effects don't seem to last more than a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Best at preventing pests
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray every spring around all doors and windows and I find it be very effective against ants and stink bugs. strong scent but fades after a day. peace of mind using it in a household with pets. i will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Smells like a cleaning product. ~lemon DOES NOT KILL ON CONTACT I HAD TO SPRAY THIS SPIDER LIKE 5X with other animals like thoses ugly centipede did kill on contact like immediately. Strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: CptsquirrelX

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We didn't find this did anything for our summer insect problems. Nice that it is natural, but it just wasn't effective for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got sick and was put in the hospital. Fruit flies moved in. This junk does not affect them. They just fly through and around. Did not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Becky A. Lonneman

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad ant infestation in my kitchen and living room. I kept putting out ant traps, but they seemed to attract even more. After I spent a small fortune on these traps, I decided to try Wondercide. It was amazing! The ants were completely gone within a few hours, and I didn't have to worry about harming pets, furniture, etc. Wondercide is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: MissMarty

customer_reviews.title: Effective but not Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Smells disgusting but works well . The spray Mechanism was very disappointing as it sprayed out really hard and would only hit small areas . Was hoping it would of been a little more misty . But this crap works it kills the bugs which is what you want buying this .
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Only worked about 24 hours after application. Over powering smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money; doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This has a strong smell, and did not seem to have any effect on bugs.
customer_reviews.author: zmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had such high expectations for this product but it did not work to repel gnats. As soon as the smell dissipated they returned. That's $35 I could've just tossed out of the window. Sad and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yayle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pest Control
customer_reviews.text: This product’s name is quite suitable; it’s wonderful! The smell is heavenly unlike other cleaning products that might leave you gasping for air. As soon as I began spraying, spiders I didn’t even know were there began crawling out. The scent lingers and goves the bathrooms a clean, fresh fragrance that felt natural. Will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product, Our master closet were getting moths. We tried everything and I mean everything on the market. This product works!!!. It kills oh contact and lasts. This product is safe for our small dog and kids in the house. I would recommend this everyday and 10 times over.!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. WONG

customer_reviews.title: Just bad.
customer_reviews.text: Product did NOT kill or keep away ants or roaches. The lemon scent is so gross smelling. And for $30 that I paid, I will NOT be purchasing again. Bengal gold spray works best.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Coel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: kills bugs very well
customer_reviews.text: the smell is good but a bit strong, but i do have a sensitive nose, otherwise kills bugs really well
customer_reviews.author: Ilona

customer_reviews.title: you have to have this product at home
customer_reviews.text: excellent, we have problems with spiders and this product kills them all .. and keeps them away .. my husband loves to kill flies and mosquitoes with this product, they die instantly
customer_reviews.author: Maria Barragan

customer_reviews.title: A safe great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works on contact! It also keep ants at bay! Most important is that it is SAFE for use around my pets! Great product, love their flea & tick formula too!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: It smells intense
customer_reviews.text: It has a so heavy smell that you cannot stay in the room within min 1 day. Not ideal for bedrooms and living rooms
customer_reviews.author: e1494

customer_reviews.title: Watch your stainless appliances
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for getting rid of pests and the smell is great. I used it in my kitchen as it says I can do and it seriously damaged my stainless steal appliances. It marked them and I am still trying to figure out how to fix it. Use it but not around ANYTHING metal.
customer_reviews.author: Treacy Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stuff
customer_reviews.text: This kills bugs on contact. Better yet, I sprayed where we had a stream of ants and it stopped anymore coming in. I spray around doors, and baseboards and it effectively keeps bugs out. Smells like grass. Fantastic stuff
customer_reviews.author: renee cain

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive, Does Nothing
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use, I can honestly say it does NOTHING. For such an expensive bottle, you would expect it to work. It only kills on direct contact, which an cheaper item can do. The scent is extremely strong and will bother no matter where you are.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective, strong odor
customer_reviews.text: The Lemongrass spray was surprisingly effective with a sudden fruitfly infestation. Be aware that its aroma is strong and lingers for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: D. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Instant results
customer_reviews.text: The spray instantly kills insects and keeps them away. You must continue to spray it throughout the week though, to keep bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Ha

product_meta.title: Wondercide Natural Products - Indoor Pest Control Spray for Home and Kitchen - Fly, Ant, Spider, Roach, Flea, Bug Killer and Insect Repellent - Eco-Friendly, Pet and Family Safe — 32 oz Lemongrass
feature_bullets: KILLS & REPELS. A preventative and a treatment, this pet-safe insect spray kills and repels indoor pests and keeps your home pest-free. Kills flying, crawling, biting and stinging pests including ants, roaches, spiders, flies, fleas, ticks, wasps, scorpions, mosquitoes, fruit flies, silverfish, moths, gnats, carpet beetles, earwigs, palmetto bugs, waterbugs.

PROTECT YOUR HOME. This versatile bug control spray is also an indoor flea treatment and flea killer for your home. It kills fleas in carpet, furniture, bedding and flooring, and eliminates adults, eggs, and larvae in the home without staining.

SAFE FOR DOGS & CATS. Pet-friendly, this spray is gentle enough to use several times a week around your loved ones, throughout the house, yet powerful enough to fully eliminate pests and provide lasting defense of your household from invading insects.

PLANT-BASED AND POWERFULLY EFFECTIVE. Using natural essential oils, this spray is a safe alternative to electronic bug zappers, lights, traps, powders, granules and conventional pesticides. No artificial colors, fragrances or harsh chemicals. Biodegradable. Cruelty-Free.

EASY-TO-USE. This eco-friendly biopesticide can be sprayed easily around the home, throughout the kitchen, bathroom, and any other living areas. Simply spray around windows, doors, baseboards, under sinks, in cabinets, and around appliances. Works great for dog kennels and cat condos, too! Spray as often as desired for a pest-free home. Made in the USA from naturally-derived ingredients and safe around children. Safe when used as directed.
